Skull.Description:
A polished skull from some creature, it's cold to the touch.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Skull.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a haunted skull; deal 20-30 damage to nearby enemies.
Skull.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a haunted skull; deal 30-40 damage to nearby enemies.
Skull.AbilityDescription.3: Summon a haunted skull; deal 40-50 damage to nearby enemies.
Bat.Description:
A colorful wing from a ghastly bat.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Bat.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a bat; on critical hit, recover 13 HP and 13 Energy.
Bat.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a bat; on critical hit, recover 13% of the damage dealt as HP and Energy.
Stick.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a stickbug; harvest nearby forage, recover 44 HP on success.
Stick.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a stickbug; harvest nearby crops, recover 44 Energy on success.
Stick.AbilityDescription.3: Summon a stickbug; harvest nearby forage and crops, recover 44 HP and Energy on success.
DustSpirit.AbilityDescription.1: Summon 3 dust spirits; every 10s, break nearby rocks and grant +20 attack.
DustSpirit.AbilityDescription.2: Summon 3 dust spirits; every 2s, break nearby rocks and grant +5 attack.
Spider.Description:
A tiny plastic spider on some decorative webbing, scuttles around sometimes.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Spider.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 3s every 10s.
Spider.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 4s every 9s.
Spider.AbilityDescription.3: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 5s every 8s.
Snek.Description: Emits indescribable aroma, attract iridium snakes.
AngryRoger.Name: Angry Roger
AngryRoger.Dialog.1: Bring to me the flesh and spirit of the damned ~~~
